name: 林子喬
objective: 探討各種電機特性及工作原理，內容包含：(1)磁路分析(2)電機-機械能量轉換 (3)繞組及氣隙磁動勢 (4)繞組電感及電壓方程式 (5)繞組因數 (6)直流機
schedule:
W1: Course Introduction and Rules
W2~W4: Overview of Relative Electromagnetic Conversion Theories 
W5~W7: Transformers
W8: Transformers & Course Review  
W9: Midterm Exam
W10: Midterm Commentary & Fundamental of DC Machines Theories 
W11: Fundamental of DC Machines Theories 
W12~W14: Theories of DC Motors
W15~W16: Theories of DC Generators
W17: Theories of DC Generators & Course Review
W18: Final Exam
materials:
(一)．Text book ：Stephen J. Chapman, PH PTR , 5th edition (Feb. 18, 2011), 東華書局代理.

(二)．Reference book：A. E. Fitzgerald, Electric Machinery, McGraw-Hill , 6th edition (July 25, 2002).
